_source.short_desc: Mental health EMR/EHR & therapy notes software for practices of all sizes. Lots of features & reports. Easy to use. Free to try.
_source.long_desc:
EHR practice management software with Wiley Planners add-on, Telehealth for online therapy, mobile responsive interface, client portal, DSM/ICD codes, progress notes, treatment plans, discharge notes, review & co-sign notes, custom forms.  
Billing features: PQRS, claims & ERA/EOB, superbills, credit card service, batch invoice/claims.
Sync with Google/iCal. Voice, text, email reminders. 
Tons of reports included: Payroll, Staff Billing, etc. 
Unlimited document storage, unlimited support.
_source.pricing_details:
The product pricing varies according to the number of active clients.
30 Active Clients Plan - $39.00/mo 
40 Active Clients Plan - $50.00/mo 
50 Active Clients Plan - $60.00/mo 
80 Active Clients Plan - $91.00/mo 
100 active clients or more will need to contact sales
_source.target_audience: We serve solo practitioners & large therapy practices. Family counseling centers, mental health agencies, social service organizations, faith-based groups, psychology practices, schools, universities.

related_products.short_desc: Self-service appointment scheduling with the world's friendliest scheduling tool, so you can save time for the rest of your to-do list.
related_products.features: Save time and keep your patients organized with Acuity's HIPAA-compliant, self-service scheduling solution. From the moment a patient schedules an appointment with you, Acuity sends customized confirmations, delivers text reminders, stores SOAP notes, lets patients reschedule based on your availability, and processes payments. You can even set up video conferencing, so you can interface with your patients remotely. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly!

related_products.short_desc: Make the switch today to see why 100,000+ health and wellness entrepreneurs trust SimplePractice to run their business.
related_products.features: Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. After you approve a request, you can send paperless intakes and insurance forms directly from the Client Portal. Set up AutoPay to get paid on time, every time. Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. Work on-the-go with our mobile app and integrated telehealth platform. Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: VOTED BEST VALUE AWARD!!! Top Choice for Practice Management! We make running your practice EASY, ORGANIZED and SECURE. Try Us Free!
related_products.features: VOTED BEST VALUE AWARD By Capterra!!! Top Choice for Practice Management!  Personalized. Efficient. Complete. Online practice management exactly the way you want it. Offering live online chat & video sessions, custom questionnaires & forms, email messaging, scheduling and calendar, billing and invoicing, treatment plans, and more. Try Us Today to see if you like it as much as our current members do!! Now offering 14 Day Free Trial! (No credit card required).

related_products.short_desc: Our award-winning healthcare IT solutions give providers greater control, so they can focus on what they do best.
related_products.features: athenaOne organizes the moment of care, performs administrative and quality services to ensure full payment, and tracks all physician orders so doctors can focus on what they do best. Deliver high quality care. With athenaOne, Doctors benefit from continuous access to the best practices of the nation's largest clinical network, the most up-to-date and extensive quality rules and industry guidelines, and 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes software helps therapists manage their practices more efficiently.
related_products.features: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes helps behavioral health therapists manage their practices more efficiently through an easy-to-use, secure platform for notes, billing, scheduling, and more. TherapyNotes simplifies administrative work, giving practitioners more time and energy to focus on providing effective care for their clients.

related_products.short_desc: DrChrono cloud-based mobile EHR with PM includes live claims feed, real time eligibility checks, custom templates and appt reminders.
related_products.features: DrChrono's all-in-one cloud-based mobile EHR comes with speech-to-text and custom templates/forms to chart effectively. With DrChrono's practice management and medical billing software you get a live claims feed for billing and payment processing, HCFA/Superbill generation, and e-fax integration. Real-time eligibility checks help you check patients' information, and you can send custom appointment reminders through email, SMS, or phone. For students please visit DrChrono University.

related_products.short_desc: Optimize the patient care experience for behavior & mental health patients with RXNT's cloud-based Practice Management and EHR systems.
related_products.features: RXNT's cloud-based healthcare software optimizes the behavioral and mental health patient care experience. Increase productivity and improve RCM with the integrated PM system, and streamline your practice workflows with the certified EHR solution. Providers get real-time health and prescription history at the point-of-care. 'Smart' keys and forms enhance customization and eliminate redundancy for maximum efficiency. And, single sign-on (SSO) simplifies operations for multiple locations.

related_products.short_desc: CareLogic is web-based Electronic Health Record (EHR) system for behavioral health and human services organizations.
related_products.features: CareLogic is a web-based and easy-to-use Electronic Health Record (EHR) platform designed for enterprise behavioral health and human services organizations. Our highly configurable EHR platform helps improve outcomes, drive efficiencies and demonstrate performance. Capabilities include scheduling, intake, treatment planning, service documentation, ePrescribing, consumer engagement, telehealth, billing and reporting.

related_products.short_desc: Therasoft Practice Management with integrated Teletherapy. Mobile apps with secure video and payments for Client & Therapist.
related_products.features: Switch to Therasoft. The Practice management platform starting at $69 a month per therapist. $99 per month for unlimited electronic claims and ERAs. Struggling with your UNPAID CLAIMS? Try our Receivables Management service. Ask about our Telehealth Bundle with Marketing, Management, Clinical and Billing - all-in-one COMPREHENSIVE package. A professional website. Secure Video. Credit card processing. Mobile Apps for Clinicians and clients in  Android & iOS. ePrescribe available for psychiatrists

related_products.features: Enhance patient care with InSync's fully integrated, easy-to-use, cloud-based healthcare IT solutions. similar_products.short_desc: Web-based Mental Health practice management software with electronic claims processing - the most user-friendly solution available.
similar_products.features: Kareo web-based EMR & medical billing software for Mental Health practices with integrated e-claims processing is the most user-friendly and easy set-up solution on the market. With non-physician provider pricing starting at $80, there's no reason not to join 75,000 providers using Kareo. With Kareo you can schedule appointments, verify insurance eligibility, send e-claims, receive e-insurance payments, manage collections, store documents online, and print custom reports.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve clinical outcomes, increase your efficiency, and run a more profitable practice with Valant's Behavioral Health EHR Software.
similar_products.features: Valant's Behavioral Health EHR enables you to provide exceptional care and run a successful practice. Valant is designed to increase your administrative and clinical efficiency. With built-in outcome measures, billing, reporting, e-prescribing, telehealth, payment processing, patient engagement, and clinical documentation tools, your practice will upgrade the quality and efficiency of practice. Offer seamless medication management, psychotherapy, group counseling sessions, and more with Valant.

similar_products.short_desc: AZZLY Rize is an all-in-one addiction treatment and behavioral healthcare EHR/RCM solution, for small, medium, and large organizations.
similar_products.features: AZZLY Rize is a top-rated addiction treatment and behavioral healthcare-specific EHR, Telehealth Ready and RCM system. We serve small, medium, and large organizations. Rize is very customizable and scalable. Features include e-check-in, scheduling, appointment reminder, EHR, treatment plans, progress notes, outcome measurement tools, medication management, withdrawal management, e-prescribing, EPCS, PDMP, patient communication tools, and electronic billing and claims submission.

similar_products.short_desc: TheraPlatform is a HIPAA-compliant EMR, practice management and telehealth platform designed for mental health providers and therapists
similar_products.features:
TheraPlatform is All-in One HIPPA compliant EMR, practice management and Telehealth platform for mental health providers. 
Streamline your practice with our comprehensive features: scheduling, documentation, paperless intake/consent forms; note templates; Wiley treatment planners, billing; e-claims, client portal; Free built- in Telehealth with built- in whiteboard, screen-sharing, resource library and more. 
Get paid faster with Auto-Pay and Auto-Claim!

Start 30-Day Free Trail (no CC needed)!

similar_products.short_desc: Apricot is a secure, flexible, and easy-to-use case management solution for nonprofits of any size.
similar_products.features: Develop individual plans to ensure your clients are getting the correct treatment and work collaboratively to refer clients between programs for optimum care. Meanwhile, meet funding requirements and measure your overall progress towards organizational goals and outcomes. Our software ensures you can manage and report on the services you offer in one easy-to-use tool.

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one behavioral health EHR and practice management system keeps things consistent between patient care and business operations.
similar_products.features: NextGen Healthcare integrates behavioral, physical, and oral health data on a single platform for a comprehensive view of patient health. The goal: a whole-person approach to care. Configurable workflows and reports, as well as telehealth solutions and a smart digital pen, promote clinical flexibility, improve care coordination, and enhance patient access. In our commitment to elevate behavioral healthcare, our fully integrated solutions help reduce administrative and clinical errors.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Medical Records software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Medical Records tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Medical Records software (EMR) automates the documentation, storage and retrieval of patient records. EMR software streamlines data entry, automates diagnosis and CPT code selection, minimizes required paper records, reduces transcription costs, provides up-to-date patient histories and reduces the turnaround time for patient visits and retrieving lab results. Using Electronic Medical Records solutions, doctors, offices and healthcare organizations save time, reduce medical errors, perform less paperwork and provide more accurate diagnoses for their patients. Electronic Medical Records software is related to Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Hospital Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Hospital Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospital Management software automates processes including billing, appointments, scheduling, regulatory compliance and financial auditing within hospitals. These applications offer integration across the financial, clinical, and operational elements of a healthcare practice and enable users to optimize their office workflow and reduce their operational expenses. Hospital Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software, .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Billing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Billing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Billing software manages patient billing and collections for the medical industry. Hospitals, clinics, and doctors offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential business processes including: accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Medical Billing solutions typically allow for the tracking of patient demographics, background data, and insurance information. Medical Billing software is related to Chiropractic software, Claims Processing software, Dental software, Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software and Medical Scheduling software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Scheduling software assists with patient, staff, and facilities scheduling for the medical industry. These applications automate a broad range of business process functions for medical offices. Doctors and administrators use Medical Scheduling software to manage their appointment calendars, staff scheduling, patient records, and billing and invoicing. Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Transcription software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Transcription tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Transcription software enables doctors to transcribe patient notes via voice dictation. Doctors and administrative personnel use Medical Transcription applications to speed the process of converting spoken notes into formal records. Typically Medical Transcription software provides automation tools facilitating fast and accurate transcriptions along with process oriented functions that allow efficient, accurate record management. Medical Transcription software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patient Case Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Patient Case Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patient Case Management software is used to manage and track patients within the healthcare and social services professions. This type of software is often used by social service agencies, non-profits, hospitals, and mental health clinics, to track, monitor, and report on the status of long and short term patients. Patient Case Management software is related to Mental Health software, Human Services software and Association Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patient Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Patient Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patient Management software incorporates solutions for bed availability management, patient tracking throughout the facility, be it a hospital or a smaller healthcare clinic, and patient queue management for various healthcare organizations. For related software solutions see Patient Case management software and Healthcare Management software.

A fully integrated client portal is free. Telehealth starts at $12/month per therapist.

related_products.short_desc: Make the switch today to see why 100,000+ health and wellness entrepreneurs trust SimplePractice to run their business.
related_products.features: Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. After you approve a request, you can send paperless intakes and insurance forms directly from the Client Portal. Set up AutoPay to get paid on time, every time. Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. Work on-the-go with our mobile app and integrated telehealth platform. Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: NextGen Healthcare practice management solutions improve patient care, boost staff satisfaction, and enhance revenue.
related_products.features: NextGen Healthcare practice management solution NextGen? Office Practice Management (1-10 physicians) and NextGen? Enterprise Practice Management (10+ physicians) support all aspects of running a healthcare business. With claim denial management, automated eligibility checks, a proprietary clearinghouse, a patient portal, and drag and drop scheduling, practices can save time, improve patient care, boost staff satisfaction, enhance revenue, and engage patients in their own healthcare.

related_products.short_desc: 10to8 is Medical Practice Management Software trusted by clinics & hospitals worldwide. Get started today.
related_products.features:
10to8 is Medical Practice Management Software trusted by clinics & hospitals worldwide.

10to8 allows for multi-office and multi-physician setup so it is a great tool for bigger medical practices. 

Through 10to8?s booking page, scheduling is easy both for patients & physicians. Reduce no-shows with automated SMS & email reminders. Empower patients to manage their appointments through the patient portal.

Keep Protected Health Information safe with our HIPAA tools. Get started today.

related_products.short_desc: DrChrono Practice Management, cloud-based and fully integrated with EMR and billing streamlines and improves your practice operation.
related_products.features: DrChrono offers an integrated practice management software that can be tailored to meet the unique needs of your practice. Whether small or big, equip yourself with the system that will enable you to build the practice you?ve dreamt of. Streamline your practice with a 100% digital solution that offers you real time eligibility check, automated reminders, task management, single data entry, integrated billing, online check-in and more. For students please visit DrChrono University.

related_products.short_desc: Enables interactive online eligibility verification, claims submission, and reporting for a low subscription fee.
related_products.features:
NueMD is the leading cloud-based medical management solution for small and mid-sized  practices. NueMD offers secure, HIPAA-compliant access to software that streamlines the patient care cycle and simplifies administrative tasks to just a few key strokes. 
NueMDs established client base of over 24,000 users in 50 states is proof of our success. Increase your profitability while better serving your patients with NueMD.

related_products.short_desc: Medical practice management solution that helps businesses with insurance billing, CMS 1500 forms filling, payment tracking, and more.
related_products.features: Speedy  Claims is possibly the easiest to use software available anywhere for billing your patients and insurance companies whether  by paper or electronically. An easy to use point and click interface showing the actual CMS 1500 form on the screen makes filling out a claim simple and coupled with our error checking scrubber makes it accurate and powerful.  Try us free for 30 days!

related_products.short_desc: Run simpler, streamlined medical business operations and maximize revenue with RXNT's integrated Practice Management software.
related_products.features: RXNT's cloud-based Medical Practice Management (PM) system enhances practice-related workflows, from billing and collections, scheduling, appointment reminders, insurance eligibility, charge capture, assigning ICD-10 codes, and remittance. And, single sign-on (SSO) simplifies operations for central billing offices. Our feature-rich Medical Billing and Scheduling system comes with configurable reporting, automated claims checks, online patient bill pay, and mobile apps for iOS and Android.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud image management platform improves physician and administrative productivity and increases patient satisfaction.
related_products.features: Ambra Health is a cloud-based medical image management platform. Intuitive, scalable and highly interoperable, the Ambra cloud platform is designed to serve as the backbone of imaging innovation and progress for healthcare providers. With Ambra, medical practices have transformed the way they manage medical images, improving collaboration with referring physicians and patient safety while reducing costs. Platform includes image upload, exchange, scalable storage, viewing, and EHR integration.

related_products.short_desc: eClinicalWorks is a leader in healthcare IT, providing innovative, customizable Electronic Health Record (EHR) and Practice Management.
related_products.features: eClinicalWorks is a privately held leader in healthcare IT, providing comprehensive Electronic Health Record (EHR) and Practice Management (PM) solutions used by more than 850,000 providers in more than 20 countries.

related_products.short_desc: Send secure intake and consent forms privately to your clients. HIPAA compliant, e-signature support, online booking and payment
related_products.features:
IntakeQ provides beautiful and secure electronic intake forms for health professionals, enabling them to offer an amazing onboarding experience, while also optimizing and streamlining the intake process.

As a bonus, IntakeQ also offers powerful practice management features, including scheduling, payment, appointment reminders, secure messaging, telehealth, invoicing and insurance billing.

Affordable pricing, 14-day free trial, no credit card required, no software to install.

related_products.short_desc: Everything you need to run a better practice. Practice management software that offers charting, scheduling, billing, payments & more.
related_products.features:
Everything you need to run a better practice.
Noterro is an online clinic management tool for Massage Therapists, Physiotherapists, Chiropractors, and other health care providers.

Our practice management software comes equipped with features such as medical charting software, SOAP notes software, predictive charting, patient assessment software and more to help you run a better practice

similar_products.short_desc: The trusted, proven billing technology for independent practices. Simplify your medical software and maintain control of your practice.
similar_products.features: Effortlessly manage all major functions of your practice through one intuitive platform with Kareo. Our web and mobile applications help your practice easily manage patients and the complications that come with billing insurance. Kareo is a proven platform trusted by more than 75,000 providers.

similar_products.short_desc: PatientPop is an all-in-one technology solution empowering healthcare providers to attract patients and retain them for life.
similar_products.features: PatientPop is the only end-to-end practice growth platform for private medical and dental practices across the U.S. looking to attract new patients and streamline their practice management. In addition to automating time-consuming front office tasks, we boost your online presence and reputation to help you grow your practice. Through deep integration with the most widely used EMRs, we help you enhance your patient connection and deliver the best modern experience.

similar_products.short_desc: Delivers unparalleled power, flexibility, reliability, ease-of-use; comprehensive EDI for practices of any size/specialty, and RCM co's
similar_products.features: MedicsPremier delivers unparalleled power, flexibility, reliability, and ease-of-use while providing increases in efficiency with comprehensive EDI, workflow, reporting scheduling and more.  Excellent for the PM needs of any practice or RCM co.  Handles Behavioral Health, Radiology and Anesthesia billing.  System integrates with credit card processing, automated phone reminders and business intelligence dashboards for unparalleled data mining and analysis. On schedule for ICD-10 compliance.

similar_products.short_desc: Endorsed exclusively by ADA Member Advantage, RevenueWell makes it easy to run a more profitable dental practice with less effort.
similar_products.features: RevenueWell offers a suite of dental-specific solutions and services that help drive patient acquisition and retention, simplify front office workflows, improve the patient experience, and increase profitability. Endorsed exclusively by ADA Member Advantage, RevenueWell helps dental teams run more profitable practices with less effort. More than 15K dental practices trust RevenueWell to help them become more profitable with less effort.

similar_products.short_desc: UltraLinq is a cloud PACS, offering a platform for physicians and practices to upload, interpret, store, and share medical imaging.
similar_products.features:
UltraLinq is your secure, fast cloud PACS platform.

Our cloud PACS platform is designed to provide secure, fast access and retrieval of patient reports. With multi-site access from any internet-connected device, reporting is streamlined and always accessible. Advanced image reporting tools and customizable worksheets provide optimized patient reporting.

Visit us at www.UltraLinq.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use and affordable telehealth solution. Unlimited video calls, messaging, file-sharing, and recording for only 24/mo/provider.
similar_products.features: HIPAA Video is the leader in online healthcare communications. We equip Providers and healthcare professionals with a simple, customizable video solution that meets their telehealth needs. We understand the importance of HIPAA Compliance and provide only the most secure channels for handling sensitive and private information. We provide our award-winning service with no strings attached. You are in no obligation to sign long-term contracts and we will never ask you for your credit card to start.

similar_products.short_desc: Maximize your earning potential, reduce your expenses, and improve the efficiency of your practice management.
similar_products.features: talkEHR is a product of MTBC, a leading healthcare IT company that has been offering inventive solutions to improve healthcare since 1999. With a team of experienced healthcare IT professionals, MTBC has worked diligently to design a product that addresses provider needs and drives value to patients.

Intuitive, scalable and highly interoperable, the Ambra cloud platform is designed to serve as the backbone of imaging innovation and progress for healthcare providers. With Ambra, medical practices have transformed the way they manage medical images, improving collaboration with referring physicians and patient safety while reducing costs. Platform includes image upload, exchange, scalable storage, viewing, and EHR integration.

similar_products.short_desc: A queue management system that improves patient experience and provides real-time data insights.
similar_products.features:
Qminder is a cloud-based queue management system for waiting lines and walk-ins at hospitals and clinics.

We help service teams provide the highest level of patient service, manage workflows, plan follow-ups, and make the most out of each visit.

Qminder is a all-in-one solution to manage patient reception, triage, queuing and interaction. Hassle-free installation and maintenance. No technical training needed.

similar_products.short_desc: Focus on giving excellent medical care and let vcita handle the rest. Automate tasks and manage your entire practice from one app.
similar_products.features: Automate time-consuming admin tasks, so you can focus on what you do best - delivering excellent medical care. vcita's HIPAA compliant medical practice software allows you to manage your schedule, track and securely collect payments, manage patient communication, patient records and documents online - all from one place. vcita's patient portal enables patients to schedule and reschedule consultations, register and pay for group therapy sessions or receive telehealth services online- 24/7.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) software helps parents, teachers and therapists monitor, influence and document changes in the behavior of individuals with autism spectrum disorders that undergo treatment based on learning theory.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Chiropractic software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Chiropractic tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Chiropractic software automates practice management, billing, scheduling, patient care and reporting for chiropractic offices. Chiropractic offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of chiropractic SOAP notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, chiropractic practice management, electronic claims, collections and financial reporting. Chiropractic software is related to other Capterra directories like: Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Physical Therapy software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Dental software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Dental tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Dental software manages dental practice operations including billing, accounting, and scheduling. Dental offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Dental office software also typically offers a variety of data tools such as periodontal charting and three dimensional rendering or other visualization tools. Dental software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.description: e-Prescribing software allows medical providers to transmit prescriptions to pharmacies electronically.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Medical Records software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Medical Records tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Medical Records software (EMR) automates the documentation, storage and retrieval of patient records. EMR software streamlines data entry, automates diagnosis and CPT code selection, minimizes required paper records, reduces transcription costs, provides up-to-date patient histories and reduces the turnaround time for patient visits and retrieving lab results. Using Electronic Medical Records solutions, doctors, offices and healthcare organizations save time, reduce medical errors, perform less paperwork and provide more accurate diagnoses for their patients. Electronic Medical Records software is related to Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Hospital Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Hospital Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospital Management software automates processes including billing, appointments, scheduling, regulatory compliance and financial auditing within hospitals. These applications offer integration across the financial, clinical, and operational elements of a healthcare practice and enable users to optimize their office workflow and reduce their operational expenses. Hospital Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software, .

Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Billing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Billing software manages patient billing and collections for the medical industry. Hospitals, clinics, and doctors offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential business processes including: accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Medical Billing solutions typically allow for the tracking of patient demographics, background data, and insurance information. Medical Billing software is related to Chiropractic software, Claims Processing software, Dental software, Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software and Medical Scheduling software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Scheduling software assists with patient, staff, and facilities scheduling for the medical industry. These applications automate a broad range of business process functions for medical offices. Doctors and administrators use Medical Scheduling software to manage their appointment calendars, staff scheduling, patient records, and billing and invoicing. Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Transcription software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Transcription tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Transcription software enables doctors to transcribe patient notes via voice dictation. Doctors and administrative personnel use Medical Transcription applications to speed the process of converting spoken notes into formal records. Typically Medical Transcription software provides automation tools facilitating fast and accurate transcriptions along with process oriented functions that allow efficient, accurate record management. Medical Transcription software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mental Health software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mental Health tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mental Health software handles activities such as patient record keeping, billing, and scheduling for mental health facilities. Typically, Mental Health applications offer a variety of flexible features, which assist in the management and organization of patient records, progress notes, billing and invoicing, and staff and appointment scheduling. Mental health clinics use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including patient reporting generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Mental Health software is related to Human Services software, Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Optometry software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Optometry tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Optometry software is designed to manage optometry practices. Features include patient demographics, scheduling, accounts receivable, inventory and POS, electronic medical records, insurance claim submission, recalls and referrals. By streamlining office workflow, doctors and their staff are able spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Optometry software is related to Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software, and Electronic Medical Records software.

Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patient Case Management software is used to manage and track patients within the healthcare and social services professions. This type of software is often used by social service agencies, non-profits, hospitals, and mental health clinics, to track, monitor, and report on the status of long and short term patients. Patient Case Management software is related to Mental Health software, Human Services software and Association Management software.

Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Pediatric software automates the operations of pediatric practices and neonatal centers. Pediatric solutions integrate practice management and electronic medical records functionality with scheduling, billing, and inventory management capabilities allowing physicians to spend more time with their patients, reduce the amount of paperwork and cut costs. For related solutions see also Electronic Medical Records software and Medical Practice Management software.

pricing_plans.name: Basic
pricing_plans.description: Pricing starts at $39 per month for 30 active clients and it is subject to contacting sales if users wish to opt for more than 100 active buyers. The annual pricing option is also available at $429/year for up to 30 clients. Add-ons are applicable. Whiley Practice Planner starts at $25/month per therapist. A fully integrated client portal is free. Telehealth starts at $12/month per therapist.
